backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko canister actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three high-confidence image update and content‑consistency requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing key frontend files and recent updates such as new assets and removed cardiology references.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO metadata and favicon links pointing to the generated favicon asset.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Simple root component rendering the LandingPage.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Renders a styled contact section using centralized contact constants; includes address, phones, email, and emergency info.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying hospital info, contact links, location, and attribution using shared contact constants.
frontend/src/components/SpecialtiesSecti: Displays seven medical specialties using icons and descriptions sourced from centralized department constants.
frontend/src/constants/departmentDisplay: Defines names and descriptions for seven medical departments for consistent use across components.
frontend/src/constants/hospitalContact.t: Centralized hospital contact data including phones, email, address, name, and tagline.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and tracks an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future React Query hooks; currently exports nothing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for the site's color theme, typography, and global styles including light/dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Implements the main landing page UI with hero, contact actions, about section, specialties, and footer using hospital contact constants.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, animations, typography, and plugins for the site’s design system.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, existing features, and constraints for updating the KVR Hospital website.
